name: Three Point Contest - BasketBall All-Star Shootout Competition
name_original: Three Point Contest - BasketBall All-Star Shootout Competition
description:
Can you throw the basketball like Klay Thompson in the 2016 NBA All-Star Three point shootout competition? Only the best players can get all the stars in all the difficulties. Don’t throw the phone, swipe on it! You may even be good enough to compete in the Olympics.

In the game Three Point Contest – Basketball All-Star Shootout Competition, you have to swipe the screen to toss the ball in the right direction and with enough strength. These are not the drills for the season 2017 – this is a proper contest! The goal of the game is to shoot enough 3-pointers to get to the next level. But watch out, every level is different. When you score enough starts, you unlock the more difficult levels.

Foot locker contest isn’t played in the 2016 Olympics in Rio – but it should be, since it is enjoyable to watch. And at the end players should get a Throwphy! Who do you think would win?
publishers: NS WEB DEVELOPMENT DOO NOVI SAD
